slide.title: Ruling party activists, with sticks and national flags in their hands, storm the Supreme Court premises yesterday. Photo: Amran Hossain/SK Enamul Haq/Courtesy
Al men chase pro-opposition lawyers who were demonstrating at the court. Photo: Amran Hossain/SK Enamul Haq/Courtesy
A number of them also beat up a pro-opposition woman lawyer at the apex court. Photo: Amran Hossain/SK Enamul Haq/Courtesy
